front.title: Collective Communication Optimization: Problem Statement and Use cases

abstract.t: Collective communication is the basic logical communication model for distributed applications. When distributed systems scales, the communication overhead becomes the bottleneck of the entire system, impeding system performance to increase. This draft describes the performance challenges when the collective communication is employed in a network with more nodes or processes participating in or a larger number of such communication rounds required to complete a single job. And the document presents several use cases where different aspects of collective communication optimization are needed.
